mapper.sql: id, user_id, course_id, evaluate_score, evaluate_content, publish_date, del_flag

insert into assist_evaluate_course
user_id,
course_id,
evaluate_score,
evaluate_content,
publish_date,
del_flag,

mapper.update:
update assist_evaluate_course
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
evaluate_score = #{evaluateScore,jdbcType=REAL},
evaluate_content = #{evaluateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update assist_evaluate_course set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, evaluate_score = #{evaluateScore,jdbcType=REAL}, evaluate_content = #{evaluateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_date = #{publishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(id) from assist_evaluate_course where course_id = #{courseId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = 1

select
from assist_evaluate_course where course_id = #{courseId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = 1
